manufacturing_rules.name: Tool Wear Threshold Rule
manufacturing_rules.description: If tool wear exceeds threshold, predict tool wear failure
manufacturing_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:ManufacturingEquipment)
                WHERE e.tool_wear > 200
                CREATE (e)-[:HAS_FAILURE]->(f:Failure:ToolWearFailure {
                    id: 'TWF_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    predicted_by: 'Tool_Wear_Threshold_Rule',
                    confidence: 0.85
                })

manufacturing_rules.name: Heat Dissipation Failure Rule
manufacturing_rules.description: If process temperature significantly higher than air temperature, risk of heat dissipation failure
manufacturing_rules.swrl: ManufacturingEquipment(?e) ∧ hasProcessTemperature(?e, ?pt) ∧ hasAirTemperature(?e, ?at) ∧ swrlb:subtract(?diff, ?pt, ?at) ∧ swrlb:greaterThan(?diff, 10) → hasFailure(?e, HeatDissipationFailure)
manufacturing_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:ManufacturingEquipment)
                WHERE e.process_temperature - e.air_temperature > 10
                CREATE (e)-[:HAS_FAILURE]->(f:Failure:HeatDissipationFailure {
                    id: 'HDF_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    predicted_by: 'Heat_Dissipation_Rule',
                    confidence: 0.78
                })

manufacturing_rules.name: Power Failure Rule
manufacturing_rules.description: If torque is low but rotational speed is high, indicates power issues
manufacturing_rules.swrl: ManufacturingEquipment(?e) ∧ hasTorque(?e, ?torque) ∧ hasRotationalSpeed(?e, ?speed) ∧ swrlb:lessThan(?torque, 30) ∧ swrlb:greaterThan(?speed, 1600) → hasFailure(?e, PowerFailure)
manufacturing_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:ManufacturingEquipment)  
                WHERE e.torque < 30 AND e.rotational_speed > 1600
                CREATE (e)-[:HAS_FAILURE]->(f:Failure:PowerFailure {
                    id: 'PWF_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    predicted_by: 'Power_Failure_Rule',
                    confidence: 0.72
                })

manufacturing_rules.name: Quality-Based Maintenance Rule
manufacturing_rules.description: Low quality products require more frequent maintenance
manufacturing_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:ManufacturingEquipment)
                WHERE e.product_type = 'L'
                CREATE (e)-[:REQUIRES_MAINTENANCE]->(m:MaintenanceAction:PreventiveMaintenance {
                    id: 'PREV_MAINT_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    reason: 'Low_Quality_Production',
                    priority: 'high'
                })

transportation_rules.name: Compressor Failure Rule
transportation_rules.description: If compressor status is off and pressure is low, compressor failure likely
transportation_rules.swrl: TransportationEquipment(?e) ∧ hasComponent(?e, ?comp) ∧ Compressor(?comp) ∧ hasStatus(?comp, 0) ∧ hasPressure(?e, ?pressure) ∧ swrlb:lessThan(?pressure, -0.05) → hasFailure(?comp, CompressorFailure)
transportation_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:TransportationEquipment)-[:HAS_COMPONENT]->(c:Compressor)
                WHERE c.status = 0 AND e.pressure < -0.05
                CREATE (c)-[:HAS_FAILURE]->(f:Failure {
                    id: 'COMP_FAIL_' + c.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    failure_type: 'CompressorFailure',
                    predicted_by: 'Compressor_Failure_Rule',
                    confidence: 0.88
                })

transportation_rules.name: Oil Temperature Anomaly Rule
transportation_rules.description: If oil temperature exceeds normal operating range, create anomaly
transportation_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:TransportationEquipment)
                WHERE e.oil_temperature > 70
                CREATE (e)-[:HAS_ANOMALY]->(a:Anomaly:TemperatureAnomaly {
                    id: 'TEMP_ANOM_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    anomaly_type: 'TemperatureAnomaly',
                    value: e.oil_temperature,
                    threshold: 70,
                    severity: 'high'
                })

transportation_rules.name: Motor Current Spike Rule
transportation_rules.description: Sudden increase in motor current indicates potential motor issues
transportation_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:TransportationEquipment)
                WHERE e.motor_current > 5.0
                CREATE (e)-[:HAS_ANOMALY]->(a:Anomaly:CurrentAnomaly {
                    id: 'CURR_ANOM_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    anomaly_type: 'CurrentAnomaly', 
                    value: e.motor_current,
                    threshold: 5.0,
                    severity: 'medium'
                })

cross_domain_rules.name: Cascade Failure Prevention Rule
cross_domain_rules.description: If one component fails, check related components for anomalies
cross_domain_rules.swrl: Equipment(?e) ∧ hasComponent(?e, ?c1) ∧ hasComponent(?e, ?c2) ∧ hasFailure(?c1, ?f) ∧ swrlb:notEqual(?c1, ?c2) → requiresInspection(?c2)
cross_domain_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:Equipment)-[:HAS_COMPONENT]->(c1:Component)-[:HAS_FAILURE]->()
                MATCH (e)-[:HAS_COMPONENT]->(c2:Component)
                WHERE c1 <> c2
                CREATE (c2)-[:REQUIRES_INSPECTION]->(i:Inspection {
                    id: 'INSP_' + c2.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    reason: 'Cascade_Failure_Prevention',
                    priority: 'high'
                })

physics_rules.name: Thermal Expansion Rule
physics_rules.description: High temperature differences cause thermal stress
physics_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:Equipment)
                WHERE e.temperature_differential > 15
                CREATE (e)-[:HAS_ANOMALY]->(a:Anomaly {
                    id: 'THERMAL_STRESS_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    anomaly_type: 'ThermalStressAnomaly',
                    cause: 'High_Temperature_Differential'
                })

physics_rules.name: Energy Conservation Rule
physics_rules.description: Power consumption should correlate with work output
physics_rules.swrl: Equipment(?e) ∧ hasPowerConsumption(?e, ?power) ∧ hasWorkOutput(?e, ?work) ∧ hasEfficiency(?e, ?eff) ∧ swrlb:divide(?calc_eff, ?work, ?power) ∧ swrlb:lessThan(?calc_eff, 0.5) → hasAnomaly(?e, EfficiencyAnomaly)
physics_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:Equipment)
                WHERE e.work_output / e.power_consumption < 0.5
                CREATE (e)-[:HAS_ANOMALY]->(a:Anomaly {
                    id: 'EFF_ANOM_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    anomaly_type: 'EfficiencyAnomaly',
                    efficiency: e.work_output / e.power_consumption
                })

statistical_rules.name: Moving Average Deviation Rule
statistical_rules.description: If current value deviates significantly from moving average, create anomaly
statistical_rules.swrl: Sensor(?s) ∧ hasValue(?s, ?value) ∧ hasMovingAverage(?s, ?avg) ∧ hasStandardDeviation(?s, ?std) ∧ swrlb:subtract(?diff, ?value, ?avg) ∧ swrlb:abs(?abs_diff, ?diff) ∧ swrlb:multiply(?threshold, ?std, 2) ∧ swrlb:greaterThan(?abs_diff, ?threshold) → hasAnomaly(?s, StatisticalAnomaly)
statistical_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (s:Sensor)
                WHERE abs(s.current_value - s.moving_average) > 2 * s.standard_deviation
                CREATE (s)-[:HAS_ANOMALY]->(a:Anomaly:StatisticalAnomaly {
                    id: 'STAT_ANOM_' + s.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    z_score: abs(s.current_value - s.moving_average) / s.standard_deviation,
                    threshold: 2.0
                })

expert_rules.name: Maintenance Schedule Rule
expert_rules.description: Equipment with multiple anomalies requires immediate maintenance
expert_rules.swrl: Equipment(?e) ∧ hasAnomaly(?e, ?a1) ∧ hasAnomaly(?e, ?a2) ∧ swrlb:notEqual(?a1, ?a2) → requiresMaintenance(?e, ImmediateMaintenance)
expert_rules.cypher_equivalent:
MATCH (e:Equipment)
                WHERE size((e)-[:HAS_ANOMALY]->()) >= 2
                CREATE (e)-[:REQUIRES_MAINTENANCE]->(m:MaintenanceAction {
                    id: 'IMM_MAINT_' + e.id + '_' + toString(timestamp()),
                    maintenance_type: 'ImmediateMaintenance',
                    priority: 'critical',
                    reason: 'Multiple_Anomalies'
                })
